name: 2DPortal
description:
2DPortal is a full Portal 2D Recreation.

Exactly as the original game, in 2DPortal you'll play as Chell, trapped in Aperture Science Laboratories, you're forced to solve test chambers to get cake and escape. You gonna use the Aperture Science Handled Portal Device, AKA Portal Gun, and you have to use the Portal Tecnhnology to finish the test chambers.

FEATURES:

  • All the Test chambers and the Boss fight are fully recreated in 2D from the Original Portal.
  • The physics of the original game are recreated.
  • The momentum is conserved between portals.
  • The game have an Arcade mode where you'll have to play the levels with a attemps limit. The game will end if you run out of attemps.
  • Spanish dub is also incluided!
  • A lot of things can be configured in the Options menu, just like the Game Language (English and Spanish), screen size, portal gun controls, and the health system.
  • The game features a "Cartoony" Art style.
  • All the sprites and backgrounds were drew in Macromedia Flash 8!
  • The game was made in Game Maker 8, so it can run even in Windows XP!
  • And the end of the test chambers, you'll have a cake... Right?

NOTES:

  • The game is in a beta state, if you find any bug, or when you find any bug, tell me.
  • The game was made in Game Maker 8 (An outdated version of game maker), so if you antivirus noticed it like a virus, its complety normal, I guess it wont happen if I use a newer game maker version but that's not the case here.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Do not close the portals when youre inside of a portal or the game will try to move you outside of the wall but it can't because youre trapped so it will lag.
  • If a item (Like Cubes or Turrets) enter in a portal, sometimes it will fall in a very slow speed with no reason.
  • Sometimes a item can react to a Portal even if is close of the portal but it had not touched it.
  • Sometimes the audio files starts to loop or end with no reason
  • The portal gun isn't placed correctly in Chell's hands.
